meanings.definition: Not moved or changed in position.
meanings.sent1: The unshifted book remained on the shelf.
meanings.sent2: The unshifted chair stayed in the corner of the room.
meanings.sent3: The unshifted puzzle pieces were surprisingly easy to put together.
meanings.sent4: Her unshifted focus on the task helped her complete it quickly.
meanings.sent5: The unshifted mountain stood tall against the sky.

meanings.sent1: The unshifted recipe called for simple ingredients.
meanings.sent2: His unshifted routine kept him organized and efficient.
meanings.sent3: The unshifted plan worked perfectly without any changes.
meanings.sent4: Her unshifted appearance surprised her friends.
meanings.sent5: The unshifted clock ticked steadily on the wall.

meanings.sent1: The unshifted furniture made the room feel cluttered.
meanings.sent2: The unshifted documents were easy to find in the drawer.
meanings.sent3: The unshifted schedule left no room for unexpected events.
meanings.sent4: His unshifted position in the company gave him stability.
meanings.sent5: The unshifted stars sparkled in the night sky.
